title: SQL Editor & Results Panel
description: Build the SQL editor component with CodeMirror for syntax highlighting. Include a Run button and Cmd+Enter keyboard shortcut. Render query results in a sortable, filterable data table. Display query execution time. Add CSV export for result sets. Implement query history stored in localStorage. Depends on TKT-B for DuckDB-WASM runtime.
